summary: The diff implements the requested mobile-first UI shell (green header, bottom nav), the four screens (Home, Add Food, NGO Alert, History), three Add Food form variations with minimal validation, and a demo client-side data model that posts to History and drives the NGO Alert message/map placeholders. The diff also adds unrelated Internet Identity/auth actor plumbing and an empty backend canister actor, which were not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication context/provider and related login/identity management hook implementation
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly avoid third-party auth beyond Internet Identity, but it did not request implementing/auth wiring for Internet Identity as part of recreating the UI; the diff adds a full Internet Identity provider and related logic.

hallucinated_features.description: Actor creation hook and React Query-based actor caching/invalidation logic for backend calls
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on UI screens and client-side demo data; it does not request setting up canister actor hooks or react-query-based actor/query invalidation.

hallucinated_features.description: Creation of an empty Motoko backend canister actor
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is entirely frontend/UI-focused with a lightweight demo model; no backend canister implementation was requested.

hallucinated_features.description: FoodPostsProvider component that currently provides no state/context
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requires a demo data model; the actual model is implemented via Zustand store. This additional provider wrapper is not requested and is effectively a no-op.
